item.title: S.非洲称电台 DJ 策划了俄罗斯征兵活动
item.description: 周一，一名被检察官指控组织招募南非人为俄罗斯对抗乌克兰的国家电台主持人与四名同案被告在约翰内斯堡附近的一家法院出庭后获准保释。【原文：A state radio presenter accused by prosecutors of organizing the recruitment of South Africans to fight for Russia against Ukraine was granted bail on Monday, alongside four co-accused after appearing in a court near Johannesburg.】

item.title: 美国支持摩洛哥公司寻求生产关键芯片材料
item.description: 美国正在支持一家摩洛哥公司，该公司计划生产一种用于制造半导体和太阳能电池板的高纯度硅。【原文：The US is backing a Moroccan company that plans to produce a highly purified form of silicon used to make semiconductors and solar panels, as Washington seeks to line up alternatives to China for materials critical to modern technology.】

item.title: 苹果芯片主管告诉员工他不会 "很快 "离职
item.description: 苹果公司芯片主管乔尼-斯鲁吉（Johny Srouji）可能离职，这有可能加剧高管流失率，但他周一告诉员工，他将暂时留在这家 iPhone 制造商。【原文：Apple Inc. chip chief Johny Srouji, whose potential departure risked worsening a bout of executive turnover, told staff on Monday that he’ll stay at the iPhone maker for now.】

item.title: 印度人工智能争夺战白热化，方法激进：免费访问
item.description: 本周，微软公司首席执行官萨蒂亚-纳德拉（Satya Nadella）成为访问印度的最新一位科技领袖，加入了众多行业大佬的行列，他们都在寻求一个潜在的巨大市场，并将这个世界上人口最多的国家作为人工智能的试验场。【原文：Microsoft Corp.’s chief Satya Nadella this week becomes the latest tech leader to visit India, joining a procession of industry bigwigs seeking to court a potentially massive market and use the world’s most populous country as a proving ground for AI.】

item.title: 特斯拉天价估值促使摩根士丹利下调评级
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）将特斯拉公司的评级下调至 "持有"，这是自2023年6月以来首次下调评级。【原文：Elon Musk is eager to transform Tesla Inc. into a robotics and artificial intelligence company, but the electric-vehicle maker’s stock price already reflects those businesses and is at a “full valuation,” according to Morgan Stanley, which lowered its rating on the company to the equivalent of a hold, its first cut since June 2023.】

item.title: 美国国债收益率在美联储拍卖前触及数月高点
item.description: 国债收益率攀升至两个多月来的最高点，此前全球大多数国家的国债市场都出现了下跌，因为投资者正在为三场美国债务拍卖和美联储的利率决定做准备，而美联储的利率决定可能会改变人们对 2026 年货币政策的预期。【原文：Treasury yields climbed to the highest in more than two months, following losses in most global government-bond markets, as investors braced for a trio of US debt auctions and a Federal Reserve interest-rate decision that may alter expectations for monetary policy in 2026.】

item.title: 纽约联储调查显示美国消费者通胀预期保持稳定
item.description: 纽约联邦储备银行的一项调查显示，11 月份美国消费者的通胀预期保持稳定，同时对就业前景的看法有所改善。【原文：US consumer inflation expectations were stable in November while perceptions about job prospects improved, according to a survey from the Federal Reserve Bank of New York.】

item.title: Cinven 接近 1.9 亿英镑收购英国顾问公司 Flint
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，私募股权公司 Cinven 即将达成收购英国咨询公司 Flint Global 多数股权的交易，该公司由与工党关系密切的高级管理人员掌舵。【原文：Private equity firm Cinven is nearing a deal for a majority stake in Flint Global, a UK advisory firm helmed by senior executives with close ties to the Labour Party, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美国支持伊拉克将卢克石油公司油田转给美国公司的计划
item.description: 美国政府支持伊拉克将卢克石油公司（Lukoil PJSC）在一个巨型油田的股份转让给一家美国公司的计划，而此时距离对这家俄罗斯公司的制裁豁免到期还有几天时间。【原文：The US government is backing Iraq’s plan to transfer Lukoil PJSC’s stake in a giant oil field to an American company, days before a sanctions waiver on the Russian firm is set to expire.】

item.title: Crypto.com 让专业人士在体育投注方面比散户领先 3 秒钟
item.description: 在瞬息万变的体育博彩世界里，几秒钟就能决定一切。在 Crypto.com 的预测市场上，这几秒钟现在属于专业人士。【原文：In the fast-moving world of sports betting, a few seconds can mean everything. On Crypto.com’s prediction market, those seconds now belong to the pros.】

item.title: 派拉蒙为华纳兄弟负债高达 540 亿美元
item.description: 就在派拉蒙天舞公司与 Netflix Inc.【原文：Paramount Skydance Corp. has lined up as much as $54 billion of financing from Wall Street’s biggest firms to help support its planned acquisition of Warner Bros. Discovery Inc., just days after the company agreed to a deal with Netflix Inc.】

item.title: 叛军占领黑格里格，南苏丹石油出口再次面临风险
item.description: 在饱受战争蹂躏的苏丹叛军夺取了将原油运往红海的关键设施之后，南苏丹的石油出口面临着新的威胁。【原文：South Sudan’s oil exports faced a new threat after rebels in war-torn Sudan seized facilities key to transporting crude to the Red Sea.】

item.title: 温暖天气削弱需求，法国电力价格跌至零点
item.description: 由于反常的温暖天气减少了供暖需求，同时强劲的风力和核能发电充斥着电网，法国的电力价格降至零。【原文：French power prices sank to zero as unseasonably warm weather cut demand for heating, while strong wind and nuclear generation flooded the grid.】

item.title: 全球最大债券基金经理之一警告 "危险 "的信用评级动态
item.description: 全球最大的债券基金之一的首席投资官对信贷市场中 "危险的 "假设提出警告，就在美联储的介入能力面临限制之际，虚高的评级可能会给投资者带来虚假的安全感。【原文：The chief investment officer of one of the world’s biggest bond funds is warning of “dangerous” assumptions in the credit market, where inflated ratings may be giving investors a false sense of security just as the Federal Reserve faces limits on its ability to step in.】

item.title: 价值飙升，保险公司加倍看好人工智能相关股票
item.description: 今年下半年，随着人工智能相关股票价格飙升，保险公司一直是这些股票的净买家。【原文：Insurance companies have been net buyers of stocks tied to artificial intelligence in the second half of the year as prices for the shares surge.】

item.title: 卢比奥表示，美国将继续推进奥库斯安全伙伴关系
item.description: 美国国务卿马可-卢比奥（Marco Rubio）表示，特朗普政府在对拜登时代向澳大利亚出售核动力潜艇的协议进行了长时间审查后，批准了与澳大利亚和英国签署的奥库斯安全协议。【原文：Secretary of State Marco Rubio said the Trump administration has endorsed the Aukus security agreement with Australia and the UK following a lengthy review of the Biden-era agreement that would sell nuclear-powered submarines to Australia.】

item.title: 人工智能计算机初创公司种子轮估值达 45 亿美元
item.description:
纳文-拉奥（Naveen Rao）加入了著名科技创始人的稀有俱乐部，为非常年轻的公司筹集了大笔资金。【原文：

Naveen Rao joins a rarified club of prominent tech founders to raise big funding rounds for very young companies. 

】

item.title: 加拿大需要 IPO 来扭转股票数量萎缩的局面
item.description: 加拿大最大的证券交易所正在萎缩，上市交易公司的数量连续第四年萎缩，即使该国的股票基准指数飙升，超过了 S&P 500 指数。【原文：Canada’s largest stock exchanges are atrophying, with the number of publicly traded companies shrinking for a fourth straight year even as the country’s stock benchmark soared past the S&P 500.】

item.title: 波音和空客完成分割 Spirit Aerosystems 资产的交易
item.description: 波音公司完成了对陷入困境的美国航空航天供应商 Spirit AeroSystems Holdings Inc.【原文：Boeing Co. completed its complex acquisition of struggling US aerospace supplier Spirit AeroSystems Holdings Inc., taking back a key part of its supply chain as it works to restore quality standards.】

item.title: 美联储会议前股市震荡；Netflix 交易引反垄断审查
item.description: 周一早盘，美国股市小幅上涨，交易员们在等待本周晚些时候美联储 2025 年最后一次会议后普遍预期的降息。【原文：US stocks rose modestly early Monday as traders await a widely expected interest-rate cut later this week following the Federal Reserve’s final meeting of 2025.】

item.title: 9.63 亿美元买入比特币，创 7 月以来最大单笔交易，策略上涨
item.description: Strategy Inc. 的股价在周一盘前交易中最高上涨了 2.8%，此前这家数字资产金库公司表示，它在 12 月 1 日至 12 月 7 日期间买入了价值 9.627 亿美元的比特币，这是该公司自 7 月份以来最大的一笔收购。【原文：Strategy Inc. shares rose as much as 2.8% in premarket trading Monday after the digital asset treasury company said it bought $962.7 million worth of Bitcoin from Dec. 1 to Dec. 7, marking its largest acquisition since July.】

item.title: 乌克兰环球银行聘请摩根士丹利参与投资者谈判
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，乌克兰环球银行的代表正在摩根士丹利组织的路演中与国际固定收益投资者会面。【原文：Representatives of Ukraine’s Universal Bank are meeting with international fixed-income investors on a roadshow organized by Morgan Stanley, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 派拉蒙以每股 30 美元的价格恶意竞购华纳兄弟公司
item.description: 就在派拉蒙 Skydance 公司与 Netflix 公司达成交易几天后，该公司以每股 30 美元的现金报价公开竞购华纳兄弟 Discovery 公司。【原文：Paramount Skydance Corp. took its bidding for Warner Bros. Discovery Inc. public with an offer of $30 a share in cash, just days after the company agreed to a deal with Netflix Inc.】

item.title: Tether 支持意大利仿人机器人公司，推动人工智能发展
item.description: 稳定币巨头 Tether 已加入意大利 Generative Bionics 公司的 7000 万欧元（8160 万美元）融资轮，该公司是一家仿人机器人初创企业，利用意大利理工学院的研究成果开发工业机器人。【原文：Stablecoin giant Tether has joined a €70 million ($81.6 million) funding round for Italy-based Generative Bionics, a humanoid-robotics startup developing industrial robots built using research from the Italian Institute of Technology.】

item.title: 玛氏公司 360 亿美元凯拉诺瓦交易获欧盟无条件批准
item.description: 玛氏公司以 360 亿美元收购麦片和品客薯片生产商 Kellanova 公司的交易获得了欧盟的批准，此前监管机构曾对这一近十年来最大的包装食品交易表示担忧。【原文：Mars Inc.’s $36 billion bid for cereals and Pringles chips maker Kellanova won European Union approval after regulators backtracked on earlier concerns over the largest packaged-food deal in almost a decade.】

item.title: 卡塔尔效仿富裕的海湾邻国成立国家人工智能公司
item.description: 卡塔尔正在成立一家开发和投资人工智能的新公司，与更大的海湾国家一起将国家资源投入到人工智能技术中。【原文：Qatar is establishing a new company to develop and invest in artificial intelligence, joining larger Gulf nations in plowing national resources into the technology.】

item.title: 希腊副总理：希腊-美国液化天然气交易重塑欧洲能源版图
item.description: 希腊副总理科斯蒂斯-哈齐达基斯（Kostis Hatzidakis）表示，希腊公司最近达成的将美国液化天然气进口到希腊并出口到中欧和东欧的协议改变了欧洲的能源未来。【原文：Recent deals for Greek companies to import US liquefied natural gas into the country for export to central and eastern Europe change the energy future of Europe, Deputy Prime Prime Kostis Hatzidakis said.】

item.title: 对冲基金泰坦霍华德帮助阿布扎比发展成为全球枢纽
item.description: 2023 年，艾伦-霍华德（Alan Howard）在阿布扎比插上了一面旗帜，这是他的同名对冲基金争取酋长国财大气粗的投资者的开场戏。几个月后，当他在阿布扎比大谈特谈时，这个前哨站已经成为他的公司最大的风险承担中心。【原文：Alan Howard planted a flag in Abu Dhabi in 2023, the opening act of his eponymous hedge fund’s campaign to win over the emirate’s deep-pocketed investors. When he talked up the city months later, that outpost was well on its way to becoming his firm’s biggest risk-taking center.】

item.title: 哈塞特称明确美联储六个月计划 "不负责任
item.description: 白宫国家经济委员会主任凯文-哈塞特（Kevin Hassett）表示，美联储制定未来六个月的利率计划是不负责任的，他强调了关注经济数据的重要性。【原文：White House National Economic Council Director Kevin Hassett said it would be irresponsible for the Federal Reserve to lay out a plan for where it aims to take interest rates over the next six months, emphasizing the importance of following the economic data.】

item.title: 特朗普称将签署行政令限制国家人工智能规则
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统表示，他将在本周批准一项行政命令，制定人工智能 "一条规则"，旨在限制各州对人工智能技术的监管政策。【原文：President Donald Trump said he would approve an executive order this week establishing “ONE RULE” on artificial intelligence aimed at limiting state-level policies regulating the technology.】
